mess.message: Software Engineer with experience of creation single page application using frameworks such as Angular, Angular Material, Bootstrap and various libraries, support application written using AngularJS.
mess.name: Anna

mess.message: Responsible and highly trustworthy with analytical, problem solving and troubleshooting capability. Results oriented and customer focused, with excellent relationship management skills.
mess.name: Alexander

mess.message: Self-motivated and able to work to own initiative, persistent to work under pressure, flexible with the ability to juggle priorities effectively, ambitious to drive the career forward and willing to learn.
mess.name: Alina
